LanguageData.MR.ForceDesperate.Tooltip: Enables spawning of regular enemies on hard environment maps.
LanguageData.MR.ForceRaidType.Tooltip: Forces every 3d raid to drop pod in center, every 4th to siege. Faction restrictions apply.
LanguageData.MR.RandomFactions.Tooltip: Allows spawned raids to belong to different factions
LanguageData.MR.SpawnThreshold.Tooltip: Determines chance for an extra raid to spawn.
LanguageData.MR.PointsOffset.Tooltip: If more than one raid spawn, raid points are rescaled with this formula: points = points*(1/totalNum + pointsOffset).
